page.title: 10Employment in Trent Vale.
page.content: We did a survey of the occupations of the fathers and mothers of the children in the St.Teresa's Junior School.Of the fathers the most popular job was factory work (14%),Most of these jobs were in the pottery industry or the Michelin Tyre factory.About 13% of fathers were involved in some form of selling.12% of fathers were in professional occupations,Teachers, Doctors,Accountants.Other popular jobs were Policemen,Electricians,Builders, Plumbers,Postmen and Engineers. Of the mothers 36% were Housewives.22% worked in shops,10% were Teachers and 10% were Nurses.Other jobs included Secretaries,Hairdressers,Dinner Ladies and Child minders.of all the fathers about 6% were un-employed.
